original_title: Merlin And Arthur The Lion King
overview: In this full length animated feature the timeless story of Merlin and Arthur is recreated for a new generation. Merlin an old magician-bear, is teaching the young Arthur what he needs to become King. However, cynical and self-involved Arthur will need to respect Merlin's magic and wisdom before he will be ready to accept his destiny.
title: Merlin And Arthur The Lion King
